title: Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen in good and evil

preview.html: We present to you the interpretation of seeing ants in a dream, which is one of the most disturbing dreams that we can have in our dreams and whose meaning we do not understand in reality. Ants are insects that cause us great discomfort when they spread in homes, especially in the summer. In addition, seeing them causes fear and anxiety in some people. But what about their presence in the dream? Is the interpretation contrary to reality and portends good or portends something bad? We will learn this through an encyclopedia that provides you with interpretations of this dream, according to Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin presented several interpretations of seeing ants in the following cases: Ibn Sirin interpreted that seeing termites in a dream indicates the dreamer’s goodness represented in Its birth is for females. Seeing ants in general in a dream indicates the birth of many children, especially if the dreamer sees these ants in his bed. If a merchant sees ants scattered in his shop in his dream, this indicates something they hate about him, which is stealing his money or not working. Unlike seeing termites, seeing black ants in a dream means that only male children will be born, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin narrated that if a person sees ants coming out of his house, this indicates the death of one of the household, and God knows best. An ant bite in a dream Different interpretations, it can indicate abundant nutrition and it can indicate recovery from illness. Whoever is sick and sees large ants in his dream, it will become clear to him in his vision that he will soon die from his illness, and God knows best. Seeing ants entering the house is good and abundant, so whoever sees that ants He enters his house carrying food on his back, and his vision expresses the entry of food and many good things into that house, and the vision of something good that is certain to continue. The appearance of ants entering the house, and the people of this house will receive from this a really good thing. But if he sees the ants coming out of the house, then the people of that house will suffer from poverty and hunger, and God knows best. Muhammad bin Sirin indicated that seeing ants coming out of the house means that the people of that house are sad. Or they are worried or fall into a misfortune represented by lack of money, poverty, or sadness, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen explained that if a person sees that he is eating red ants in a dream, this symbolizes the sins and misdeeds committed by the dreamer, and God knows best. If a man sees a lot of ants coming out of his house, this indicates poverty and bad financial conditions for the dreamer. Whoever sees ants coming out of the fence in his dream, this indicates the difficulties he will face on the trip if he intends to travel in reality, and God knows best. Ibn Shaheen narrated that whoever eats ants White in his dream indicates kindness and abundance of sustenance, and it may foretell an abundance of money. Whoever sees ants leaving a country, seeing them shows a loss for the people of that country, as many of them will die in the war or a great epidemic will strike them, and many of the people of that country will die. Ants leave their house flying with their wings, so seeing them indicates the journey of the dreamer’s children and their exit from the country, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about ants in a dream

title: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a man in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a man in a dreamInterpretation of dreams about seeing a man in a dream, the meaning of a handsome man in a dream for a single married woman and a pregnant woman, the meaning of a black man, a symbol of an unknown man, seeing a man who likes me and the man in a dream is one of the visions that many people have depending on his appearance and situation in A dream, and it will certainly have many meanings and interpretations that we will cover by explaining the dream of a man in detail in this article. Interpretation of a dream of a man by Ibn Sirin: Interpretation of seeing a handsome man in a dream, as narrated by Ibn Sirin, as evidence of many means of a good and spacious life and changing the situation for the better. Dreaming of an ugly man in a dream is not a desirable vision that indicates that a lot of bad things will happen, such as poverty, anguish, and distress. Seeing an angry man in a dream is evidence of being exposed to chronic diseases that cannot be treated and may lead to death. Seeing a man in a mosque in a dream means getting rid of Fears and pains, overcoming crises, paying off debts, and getting closer to relief. Dreaming of seeing a famous person in a dream, and this indicates that the dreamer commits many sins, but he soon repents to his Lord. Interpretation of a man seeing a single woman: Interpretation of a dream about a handsome man in a dream For a single woman, it is evidence of good luck, good news, and many happy occasions. Seeing a man smiling in a dream for an unmarried woman is an indication that the right person is approaching her date and her wedding date, and she will be very happy with him. Dreaming of a man named Muhammad in a dream for an unmarried woman is from Desired visions that indicate marriage to a good person who is close to God and is characterized by generosity and morals. Seeing a fat man in a dream for someone means a lot of goodness, ample living, fulfillment of desires and aspirations, and achieving desired goals. Interpretation of a man’s vision for a married woman: Interpretation of a man’s dream for a married woman indicates The financial situation will improve in the coming period, the stability of her family, and the feeling of happiness with her husband. Dreaming of a strange man in the house in a married woman’s dream is evidence of following a broad diet and a lot of goodness, and an increase in lawful money and a blessing for him. Seeing an angry man in a married woman’s dream It means that there is a big problem or misfortune for her or one of her family members, but it will end. Seeing a married wife hitting a man in a dream means that there are many disagreements with the husband, which may lead to divorce and separation. Dreaming of seeing a sick man in a married woman’s dream is evidence of a feeling of weakness. And laziness, failure, despair, and the feeling of disappointment that dominates her. Interpretation of a man’s vision of a pregnant woman: Seeing a man smiling in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that he will steal the baby she wants, whether male or female, and you will be very happy with him. Dreaming of a strange man in a dream about a pregnant woman indicates An easy and accessible birth, ensuring her safety, the safety of her fetus, and her good health. Interpretation of a dream about a naked man: Seeing a man smiling in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that he will steal the new baby he wants. Whether it is male or female, you will be very happy with him.

title: Interpretation of seeing a kangaroo in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a kangaroo in a dream through the vision website roy2a.com. Seeing a kangaroo in a dream has many meanings. Seeing a kangaroo can be a sign of good or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing a kangaroo in a dream according to the condition and circumstances of the viewer and whether he is a single man or woman, married or pregnant. Today, through the Vision website, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing a kangaroo in a dream. Look at the kangaroo in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of senior interpreters. Such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a kangaroo in a dream? Seeing a kangaroo in a dream indicates a man who is attached to his family with love and tenderness and cares for his wife and children to the fullest. Seeing a kangaroo in a dream also indicates a sensitive, emotional, and emotional woman Seeing a kangaroo in a dream indicates that the monarch is a person of strength, courage, and many good qualities. Seeing a kangaroo in a dream indicates that the dreamer is making a lot of effort and effort in his life to achieve all his goals and aspirations in life. Seeing a kangaroo attack in a dream indicates Indicates that the dreamer will face some problems in his professional life. See also: Interpretation of seeing an ax in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a kangaroo in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi? Seeing a kangaroo being killed in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller is on the right path in his life. Seeing a kangaroo attack in a dream indicates many Of problems and obstacles in the dreamer’s life. What is the interpretation of seeing a kangaroo in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a single woman with a kangaroo attacking her in a dream shows that a difficult period is coming in her life. Seeing a single woman biting her kangaroo in a dream indicates that unfavorable things will happen in the coming period. Vision A single kangaroo running in a dream shows that he will soon achieve all his goals and desires. See also: Interpretation of seeing a wolf in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a kangaroo in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married kangaroo in a dream It indicates that she is a wise woman who has the ability to make the right decisions for herself and her family. Seeing a kangaroo A married man attacks her in a dream. It indicates the spread of bad talk about her reputation, and this talk will cause her a lot of trouble. Seeing a married kangaroo in a dream shows the extent of her care and love for her children. See also: Interpretation of seeing a gorilla in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a kangaroo in a dream for a man? Seeing a man as a kangaroo in a dream means Getting rid of all evil people in his life. Seeing a man attacking a kangaroo in a dream shows that he will face major crises in the coming period. Seeing animals in a dream Seeing pets in a dream shows that there are some people close to the dreamer who envy and hate him without showing it. Seeing predatory animals in a dream indicates a large number Of the good people in the dreamer’s life. Seeing yourself riding on the back of a predatory animal in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller will have a great position and a prominent position in society. Seeing fodder in a dream states that the dreamer is good.

title: The most interesting interpretations of dreaming of naked people in a dream

preview.html: The dream of covering up from the naked is one of the common dreams in which the dreamer is confused in its interpretation between good and evil, and in fact it carries different meanings and interpretations among the imams of interpretation. Therefore, our distinguished Egyptian website provides appropriate interpretations of the dream of covering up naked in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of covering up nakedness These interpretations can be evaluated based on the condition of the viewer and the nature of the vision as follows: Seeing the concealment of nakedness in general is evidence of the dreamer's great effort to earn a living and good, and it also indicates his repentance from sins and dissolution. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is naked in front of a large number of people and tries to cover his nakedness, this is evidence that he has faced repeated problems, disputes and crises in his life. Especially if the fortune teller is a man. And if he sees that he is asking people to cover his nakedness in a dream; This indicates that he has a lot of debts and wants help. But if the dreamer is a merchant and sees that he is asking for cover from the naked in his dream. This indicates the stagnation of his trade, the abundance of debts, and his loss in the near future. If the dreamer is sick and sees in a dream that he is completely naked and asks people for a piece of cloth to cover himself, and his request is violent and angry. This vision shows the imminent death of this patient. If the dreamer sees in his dream a dead person and this dead person is completely naked, he is covered with nakedness, joy, and laughter in the dream. This dream is evidence that this dead person was a righteous man in life, it indicates God's pleasure with him, and that he enjoys entering Paradise in his afterlife, and God knows best. But if the dreamer sees in a dream that half of his body is hidden and the other half is naked, this dream indicates that the fortune teller is a hypocrite who does the opposite of what he says. It also indicates that he appears before people as a pious man, and a preacher who urges them to obey and be righteous. But if he is alone, he commits sins and transgressions that anger God Almighty. This vision is a warning to the dreamer to repent to God for all the sins and transgressions he commits. The father or mother sees that their children are naked in a dream. Evidence of the weakness of these children's morals, the failure of the parents to raise them. This dream indicates his relief from his ordeal and the appearance of his innocence and his release from prison soon, God willing. If she sees that his nakedness is seen in her dream and he does not hide it, this is evidence of the disclosure of his secret and its appearance among everyone. title: Interpretation of seeing a woman in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we look at the interpretation of seeing a woman in a dream and its meaning in different situations. Seeing people in a dream is the most common dream that carries many connotations and symbols. As for the woman, the dreamer can see his mother, sister, or a relative, and each of these cases has multiple and varied meanings. As for seeing a woman he does not know at all, it has another interpretation, but in all cases this dream is among the mysterious dreams that arouse curiosity. And question its meanings. Note what the most famous dream interpreter, Ibn Sirin, said about the interpretation of this vision. Interpretation of seeing a woman in a dream. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a woman’s dream. Ibn Sirin presented different interpretations of this dream. If you see an old woman, this vision indicates kindness and a change in circumstances for the better. Seeing an elegant woman in a dream It means that the dreamer will achieve happiness in reality, and God knows best. Among the interpretations mentioned by Ibn Sirin about seeing the old woman is that this vision indicates repentance, returning to God, and abandoning transgressions and sins. If you see a girl turning into an old woman in a dream, this vision is one of the praiseworthy visions that portend With goodness, fulfilling desires, and changing circumstances for the better, and God knows best. Seeing a woman in a dream carries many other symbols, including that it indicates worldly pleasures and money. Interpretation of seeing a woman in a dream for a single woman. As for the meaning of this dream for an unmarried woman, if she sees a beautiful girl In a dream, this vision indicates her kindness, livelihood, and happiness. Seeing a single woman whom she is not familiar with also indicates that she will meet a new friend who will become one of her closest friends, and God knows best. If you see an ugly woman, this vision symbolizes the presence of hostility in her life from someone, This dream indicates sins and rumors about them. Ibn Sirin mentioned that one of the symbols of seeing a woman in an unmarried woman’s dream is that it indicates the beginning of a new phase in the life of the woman having the vision. Interpretation of a woman in a dream about a married woman. As for the meaning of this dream for a married woman, if she sees A beautiful and smiling woman, then this vision indicates that things will change for the better. If a married woman sees a young woman who is also beautiful and has a beautiful appearance, then this vision indicates stability and marital happiness. In the case of a married woman who sees in a dream that she is welcoming a woman, this vision indicates the color blue. Good and abundant for her in reality, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman. As for the meaning of this dream for a pregnant woman, if she sees a beautiful woman in a dream, this indicates goodness, happiness, and giving to her. Among the symbols that Ibn Sirin mentioned in interpreting the meaning of this dream is that seeing a beautiful woman In a dream, it indicates the ease of childbirth and the safety of the newborn. These were the most prominent interpretations of seeing a woman in a dream. At the end of this article, we would like to note that all of these interpretations presented represent the jurisprudence of interpretation scholars, so no one knows the fulfillment of these interpretations in the first part. title: Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen in good and evil

preview.html: We present to you the interpretation of seeing ants in a dream, which is one of the most disturbing dreams that we can have in our dreams and whose meaning we do not understand in reality. Ants are insects that cause us great discomfort when they spread in homes, especially in the summer. In addition, seeing them causes fear and anxiety in some people. But what about their presence in the dream? Is the interpretation contrary to reality and portends good or portends something bad? We will learn this through an encyclopedia that provides you with interpretations of this dream, according to Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin presented several interpretations of seeing ants in the following cases: Ibn Sirin interpreted that seeing termites in a dream indicates the dreamer’s goodness represented by Its birth is for females. Seeing ants in general in a dream indicates the birth of many children, especially if the dreamer sees these ants in his bed. If a merchant sees ants scattered in his shop in his dream, this indicates something they hate about him, which is stealing his money or not working. Unlike seeing termites, seeing black ants in a dream means that only male children will be born, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin narrated that if a person sees ants coming out of his house, this indicates the death of one of the household, and God knows best. An ant bite in a dream Different interpretations, it can indicate abundant nutrition and it can indicate recovery from illness. Whoever is sick and sees large ants in his dream, it will become clear to him in his vision that he will soon die from his illness, and God knows best. Seeing ants entering the house is good and abundant, so whoever sees that ants He enters his house carrying food on his back, and his vision expresses the entry of food and many good things into that house, and the vision of something good that is certain to continue. The appearance of ants entering the house, and the people of this house will receive from this a really good thing. But if he sees the ants coming out of the house, then the people of that house will suffer from poverty and hunger, and God knows best. Muhammad bin Sirin indicated that seeing ants coming out of the house means that the people of that house are sad. Or they are worried or fall into a misfortune represented by lack of money, poverty, or sadness, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen explained that if a person sees that he is eating red ants in a dream, this symbolizes the sins and misdeeds committed by the dreamer, and God knows best. If a man sees a lot of ants coming out of his house, this indicates poverty and bad financial conditions for the dreamer. Whoever sees ants coming out of the fence in his dream, this indicates the difficulties he will face on the trip if he intends to travel in reality, and God knows best. Ibn Shaheen narrated that whoever eats ants White in his dream indicates kindness and abundance of sustenance, and it may foretell an abundance of money. Whoever sees ants leaving a country, seeing them shows a loss for the people of that country, as many of them will die in the war or a great epidemic will strike them, and many of the people of that country will die. Ants leave their house flying with their wings, so seeing them indicates the journey of the dreamer’s children and their exit from the country, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about ants in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing a kangaroo in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a kangaroo in a dream through the vision website roy2a.com. Seeing a kangaroo in a dream has many meanings. Seeing a kangaroo can be a sign of good or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing a kangaroo in a dream depending on the condition and circumstances of the viewer and whether he is a single man or woman, married or pregnant. Today, through the Vision website, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing a kangaroo in a dream. Look at the kangaroo in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of senior interpreters. Such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a kangaroo in a dream? Seeing a kangaroo in a dream indicates a man who is attached to his family with love and tenderness and cares for his wife and children to the fullest. Seeing a kangaroo in a dream also indicates a sensitive, emotional, and emotional woman Seeing a kangaroo in a dream indicates that the monarch is a person of strength, courage, and many good qualities. Seeing a kangaroo in a dream indicates that the dreamer is making a lot of effort and effort in his life to achieve all his goals and aspirations in life. Seeing a kangaroo attack in a dream indicates Indicates that the dreamer will face some problems in his professional life. See also: Interpretation of seeing an ax in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a kangaroo in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi? Seeing a kangaroo being killed in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller is on the right path in his life. Seeing a kangaroo attack in a dream indicates many Of problems and obstacles in the dreamer’s life. What is the interpretation of seeing a kangaroo in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a single woman with a kangaroo attacking her in a dream shows that a difficult period is coming in her life. Seeing a single woman biting her kangaroo in a dream indicates that unfavorable things will happen in the coming period. Vision A single kangaroo running in a dream shows that he will soon achieve all his goals and desires. See also: Interpretation of seeing a wolf in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a kangaroo in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married kangaroo in a dream It indicates that she is a wise woman who has the ability to make the right decisions for herself and her family. Seeing a kangaroo A married man attacks her in a dream. It indicates the spread of bad talk about her reputation, and this talk will cause her a lot of trouble. Seeing a married kangaroo in a dream shows the extent of her care and love for her children. See also: Interpretation of seeing a gorilla in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a kangaroo in a dream for a man? Seeing a man as a kangaroo in a dream means Getting rid of all evil people in his life. Seeing a man attacking a kangaroo in a dream shows that he will face major crises in the coming period. Seeing animals in a dream Seeing pets in a dream shows that there are some people close to the dreamer who envy and hate him without showing it. Seeing predatory animals in a dream indicates a large number Of the good people in the dreamer’s life. Seeing yourself riding on the back of a predatory animal in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller will have a great position and a prominent position in society. Seeing fodder in a dream states that the dreamer is good.

Of sins and annulments. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is naked in front of a large number of people and tries to cover his private parts, this is evidence that he has faced recurring problems, disputes, and crises in his life. Especially if the fortuneteller is a man, and if he sees that he is asking people to cover their private parts in a dream; This indicates that he has a lot of debts and wants help. But if the dreamer is a merchant and sees that he is asking for a cover from a naked man in his dream. This indicates the stagnation of his business, the large number of debts, and his loss in the near future. If the dreamer is sick and sees in a dream that he is completely naked and asks people for a piece of cloth to cover himself with, and his request is violent and angry. This vision shows the imminent death of this patient. If the dreamer sees a dead person in his dream and this dead person is completely naked, then he is covered in nudity, joy and laughter in the dream. This dream is evidence that this dead person was a righteous man in life, as it indicates that God is pleased with him, and that he will be blessed with entering Paradise in his afterlife, and God knows best. But if the dreamer sees in a dream that half of his body is hidden and the other half is naked, then this dream indicates that The fortune teller is a hypocritical person who does the opposite of what he says. She also indicates that he appears before people as a pious man, a preacher urging them to obey and be good. But if he alone commits disobedience and sins that anger God Almighty. This vision is a warning to the pioneer of repentance to God from all the sins and sins he commits. A father or mother sees that their children are naked in a dream. Evidence of the weak morals of these children, the failure of the parents to raise them. This dream indicates his relief from his ordeal, the appearance of his innocence, and his release from prison in the near future, God willing. And if she sees that his nakedness is seen in her dream and he is not hiding it, This is evidence that he will reveal his secret and become visible to everyone. title: Interpretation of seeing a woman in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we look at the interpretation of seeing a woman in a dream and its meaning in different situations. Seeing people in a dream is the most common dream that carries many connotations and symbols. As for the woman, the dreamer can see his mother, sister, or a relative, and each of these cases has multiple and varied meanings. As for seeing a woman he does not know at all, it has another interpretation, but in all cases this dream is among the mysterious dreams that arouse curiosity. And question its meanings. Note what the most famous dream interpreter, Ibn Sirin, said about the interpretation of this vision. Interpretation of seeing a woman in a dream. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a woman’s dream. Ibn Sirin presented different interpretations of this dream. If you see an old woman, this vision indicates kindness and a change in circumstances for the better. Seeing an elegant woman in a dream It means that the dreamer will achieve happiness in reality, and God knows best. Among the interpretations mentioned by Ibn Sirin about seeing the old woman is that this vision indicates repentance, returning to God, and abandoning transgressions and sins. If you see a girl turning into an old woman in a dream, this vision is one of the praiseworthy visions that portend With goodness, fulfilling desires, and changing circumstances for the better, and God knows best. Seeing a woman in a dream carries many other symbols, including that it indicates worldly pleasures and money. Interpretation of seeing a woman in a dream for a single woman. As for the meaning of this dream for an unmarried woman, if she sees a beautiful girl In a dream, this vision indicates her kindness, livelihood, and happiness. Seeing a single woman whom she is not familiar with also indicates that she will meet a new friend who will become one of her closest friends, and God knows best. If you see an ugly woman, this vision symbolizes the presence of hostility in her life from someone, This dream indicates sins and rumors about them. Ibn Sirin mentioned that one of the symbols of seeing a woman in an unmarried woman’s dream is that it indicates the beginning of a new phase in the life of the woman having the vision. Interpretation of a woman in a dream about a married woman. As for the meaning of this dream for a married woman, if she sees A beautiful and smiling woman, then this vision indicates that things will change for the better. If a married woman sees a young woman who is also beautiful and has a beautiful appearance, then this vision indicates stability and marital happiness. In the case of a married woman who sees in a dream that she is welcoming a woman, this vision indicates the color blue. Good and abundant for her in reality, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman. As for the meaning of this dream for a pregnant woman, if she sees a beautiful woman in a dream, this indicates goodness, happiness, and giving to her. Among the symbols that Ibn Sirin mentioned in interpreting the meaning of this dream is that seeing a beautiful woman In a dream, it indicates the ease of childbirth and the safety of the newborn. These were the most prominent interpretations of seeing a woman in a dream. At the end of this article, we would like to note that all of these interpretations presented represent the jurisprudence of interpretation scholars, so no one knows the fulfillment of these interpretations in the first part. Ibn Sirin presented different interpretations of this dream. If you see an old woman, this vision indicates kindness and a change in circumstances for the better. Seeing an elegant woman in a dream It means that the dreamer will achieve happiness in reality, and God knows best. Among the interpretations mentioned by Ibn Sirin about seeing the old woman is that this vision indicates repentance, returning to God, and abandoning transgressions and sins. If you see a girl turning into an old woman in a dream, this vision is one of the praiseworthy visions that portend With goodness, fulfilling desires, and changing circumstances for the better, and God knows best. Seeing a woman in a dream carries many other symbols, including that it indicates worldly pleasures and money. Interpretation of seeing a woman in a dream for a single woman. As for the meaning of this dream for an unmarried woman, if she sees a beautiful girl In a dream, this vision indicates her kindness, livelihood, and happiness. Seeing a single woman whom she is not familiar with also indicates that she will meet a new friend who will become one of her closest friends, and God knows best. If you see an ugly woman, this vision symbolizes the presence of hostility in her life from someone, This dream indicates sins and rumors about them. Ibn Sirin mentioned that one of the symbols of seeing a woman in an unmarried woman’s dream is that it indicates the beginning of a new phase in the life of the woman having the vision. Interpretation of a woman in a dream about a married woman. As for the meaning of this dream for a married woman, if she sees A beautiful and smiling woman, then this vision indicates that things will change for the better. If a married woman sees a young woman who is also beautiful and has a beautiful appearance, then this vision indicates stability and marital happiness. In the case of a married woman who sees in a dream that she is welcoming a woman, this vision indicates the color blue. Good and abundant for her in reality, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman. As for the meaning of this dream for a pregnant woman, if she sees a beautiful woman in a dream, this indicates goodness, happiness, and giving to her. Among the symbols that Ibn Sirin mentioned in interpreting the meaning of this dream is that seeing a beautiful woman In a dream, it indicates the ease of childbirth and the safety of the newborn. These were the most prominent interpretations of seeing a woman in a dream. At the end of this article, we would like to note that all of these interpretations presented represent the jurisprudence of interpretation scholars, so no one knows the fulfillment of these interpretations in the first part.
